title: Adding items to an online grocery shopping cart
instructions:
Step 1: Prepare the environment for the execution of the grocery shopping cart addition task. Ensure that you are in a location with adequate lighting and that your device's operating system is up to date. The ambient temperature should be between 18°C and 25°C, and the humidity level should be between 40% and 60%. If these conditions are not met, adjust accordingly and repeat this step.

Step 2: Initiate the device's internet connection. To do this, locate the power button on the device and press it gently. Once the device is powered on, navigate to the settings application. Within the settings application, locate the Wi-Fi option and select it. From the list of available Wi-Fi networks, choose the desired network. Input the password, if required, using a combination of alphanumeric characters, while ensuring proper spacing between characters. Once the connection is established, proceed to the next step.

Step 3: Access the online grocery platform. Open a web browser application by locating the icon on the device's desktop and double-clicking it. Type the URL of the desired online grocery store into the address bar, using only the correct combination of uppercase and lowercase letters. Press the "Enter" key on the keyboard. Wait for the webpage to load. If the webpage does not load within 30 seconds, repeat this step.

Step 4: Locate the online shopping cart icon. This icon will typically be located in the top right-hand corner of the webpage. The icon may appear as a shopping bag, a basket, or a cart. Click on the shopping cart icon with the left mouse button.

Step 5: Commence the search for the desired grocery items. In the search bar, type the name of the grocery item you wish to purchase, using the correct spelling and capitalization. Be sure to include any relevant details, such as the brand name, size, or package type. After typing the search query, click the "Enter" key on the keyboard. This will display a list of available items that match the search query.

Step 6: Select the desired item from the search results. Click on the desired item using the left mouse button. This will open a product page with additional information about the item, such as its price, quantity available, and any promotional offers.

Step 7: Add the selected item to the online shopping cart. Locate the "Add to Cart" button on the product page and click it using the left mouse button. This will add the item to the online shopping cart. A confirmation message will appear, stating that the item has been added to the cart.

Step 8: Repeat steps 5 to 7 for each additional item you wish to purchase. Be sure to carefully review the contents of the shopping cart before proceeding to the checkout.

Step 9: Review the contents of the online shopping cart. To do this, click on the shopping cart icon in the top right-hand corner of the webpage. This will display the items that have been added to the cart, along with their respective quantities and prices. Carefully review the contents of the cart, ensuring that the correct items have been added and that the quantities are accurate. If any errors are found, repeat steps 5 to 7 as necessary.

Step 10: Proceed to the checkout. Locate the "Checkout" button on the shopping cart page and click it using the left mouse button. This will initiate the checkout process, which may involve entering payment information, selecting a delivery method, and confirming the order. Follow the prompts on the webpage to complete the checkout process.

Congratulations! You have successfully added items to an online grocery shopping cart using an overcomplicated series of instructions.
